00022         Sketch::Sketch(const string &fileName)
00023         {
00024             this->fileName = fileName;
00025             size = Vector2D();
00026             root = 0;
00027 
00028             /* Parse in everything. */
00029             Parser *parser = new Parser(fileName, this);
00030             parser->parse();
00031             delete parser;
00032         }
00033 
00034         Sketch::Sketch(const Vector2D &size)
00035         {
00036             this->fileName = "not loaded from file";
00037             this->size = size;
00038             root = 0;
00039         }
00040 
00041         Sketch::~Sketch()
00042         {
00043             if(root)
00044                 delete root;
00045             if(tree)
00046                 delete tree;
00047         }
00048

00050         {
00051             return fileName;
00052         }

00060         {
00061             return size;

00064         void Sketch::setRoot(Group *root)
00065         {
00066             if(this->root)
00067                 LogManager::getInstance()->warning(
00068                         "Setting root for a sketch that already has a root!");
00069             this->root = root;
00070         }
00071 
00072         Group *Sketch::getRoot() const
00073         {
00074             return root;
00075         }
00076 
00077         SketchElement *Sketch::getElementById(const string &id)
00078         {
00079             map<string, SketchElement*>::iterator result = ids.find(id);
00080             if(result != ids.end())
00081                 return result->second;
00082             else
00083                 return 0;
00084         }
00085 
00086         void Sketch::finnish()
00087         {
00088             root->finnish();
00089 
00090             processElements(root);
00091             tree = new QuadTree(&boundedObjects, 100);
00092         }
00093 
00094         void Sketch::render() const
00095         {
00096             root->render();
00097         }
00098 
00099         void Sketch::render(BoundingBox *boundingBox)
00100         {
00101             vector<BoundedObject*> result;
00102             tree->findObjects(boundingBox, &result);
00103             for(vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = result.begin();
00104                     iterator != result.end(); iterator++) {
00105                 Path *path = (Path*) *iterator;
00106                 path->render();
00107             }
00108         }
00109 
00110         void Sketch::render(Renderer *renderer)
00111         {
00112             root->render(renderer);
00113         }
00114 
00115         void Sketch::processElements(Group *group)
00116         {
00117             /* For all sketch elements in this group. */
00118             for(int i = 0; i < group->getNumberOfSketchElements(); i++) {
00119                 SketchElement *element = group->getSketchElement(i);
00120 
00121                 /* Set the id. */
00122                 ids[element->getId()] = element;
00123 
00124                 /* Add to the objects list. */
00125                 if(element->getType() == SKETCHELEMENTTYPE_PATH)
00126                     boundedObjects.push_back((Path*) element);
00127 
00128                 /* Recurse if we are dealing with a group. */
00129                 if(element->getType() == SKETCHELEMENTTYPE_GROUP)
00130                     processElements((Group*) element);
00131             }
00132         }
00133     }
00134 }
